function.name: setPickupTime
function.description: Set custom pickup time when customer requests specific time. Minimum 10 minutes. Use when customer says 'in X minutes', 'in 1 hour', 'in 2 hours', etc. Convert to minutes: 15 mins=15, 1 hour=60, 2 hours=120. ALWAYS repeat back the pickup time to customer for confirmation.

minutes.description: How many minutes from now for pickup. Must be at least 10.
